comments.text:
User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64) AppleWebKit/534.30 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/12.0.742.112 Safari/534.30

Steps to reproduce:

In Folder Properties -> Retention Policy, you can select to "Delete messages more than x days old".  This should be made more flexible than just Days.


Actual results:

You can only enter the # of days, when it should be more flexible than that.


Expected results:

In Folder Properties -> Retention Policy, you can select to "Delete messages more than x days old".  Turn the days into a drop down menu, and allow setting it to:

#1:Seconds
#2:Minutes
#3:Hours
#4:Days
#5:Weeks
#6:Months
#7:Years
